Web Design Agency Landing Page

Click the link below to download this Figma Template.

What is this?

This is a landing page I made offering website design and development services. One of first thing you'll notice about this web page's design is how colorful it is. The reasons for that is because at some point while working on some of my other project I got tired of seeing everything against a white background.

Call To Action

The hero section of this page features a call-to-action on the left side with the offer "Let's Build Your Exact Website Today".
Below that you'll find two subheading. The subheading on top specifies the exact services and the one below that guarantees a quick turnaround time.

Visual & Designs

On the right side of this landing page I chose to display some of the WordPress icons along with the logo to further associate the visuals with the type of services being offered to avoid any confusion.

Service Section

Service Section The services section features three general types of web development and design services in a row, each with it's own icon shape to help distinguish each one. Website Design - Custom Web Page Design, Website Redesigns Search Engine Optimization - Local Content Strategies Keyword Research Website Development - WordPress, Larval, HTML, JavaScript Download The Figma - Web Design Agency Landing Page Available For Work - Email To Contact

Font Family Used in This Design

The font used for this project is Josefin-Sans
